description:
So this guy turned out to be pretty hot. Kinda of the rough and tough manly man type. Former military, looking to use his ample equipment for porn.
I know solos are boring to many, but this guy is oozing sex all over the place. I definitely need to get him in for a clearer solo, and I do believe he said he will let a guy suck him off.
If you aren't a fan of solos, scrub through it anyway, clearly you can see the potential in this dude!
Hot, right down to fucking the cushions of his couch!
So that's how you get those hard-to-reach lost coins!
title: Carlos Garcia - peep
